title: Strengthening App Development Practical Competencies: Time Management and Academic Persistence Enhancement for Remote Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific literacy and digital device usage skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can create a daily 2-hour learning plan for five days a week and adhere to it at least 80% of the time.
Learners can revise assignments by incorporating feedback from an automated feedback system at least three times before finalizing.
Learners can submit science-related tasks within 24 hours by applying time management strategies (e.g., prioritization, task segmentation).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
